import sys

T = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
for t in range (0, T):
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    a.sort()
    print(a[n]-a[n-1])

t=int(input())
while t:
    n=int(input())
    a=input().split()
    for i in range(2*n):
        a[i]=int(a[i])
    a.sort()
    print(a[n]-a[n-1])
    t-=1
